bug.author: masgh021
bug.description: hello everybody i installed openvino library with this tutorial this and i link visual studio to inference engine library like this image image1 IMAGE ADDRESS : pasteboard.co/INjdlBx.png and lib folder and Files are in this image image2 IMAGE ADDRESS : pasteboard.co/INjf2Cc.png my problem is in c++ code sample when visual studio runinng program i get this error exception that . exceptionErrorImage IMAGE ADDRESS : pasteboard.co/INjgyc5.png this is the error text Unhandled exception at 0x00007FF9D7BF4048 in Openvino_cv64_number2.exe: Microsoft C++ exception: InferenceEngine::details::InferenceEngineException at memory location 0x000000BF8EAFE5D0. for the first line . Core ie; my laptop is lenovoE530 intel i5-3210M i test my code with other system with this details intel corei7 8700k but same error for running . please help me .

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/masgh021>@masgh021</denchmark-link> could you please try to build OpenVINO samples and see if there are any difference with your application?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/masgh021>@masgh021</denchmark-link> Can you try to use the last version of the OpenVINO?
It seems that the issue is not actual as no response. Closing it. Feel free to reopen it or better create a new one.
